p.k: War, Art, Classic Italy (1945). Hrají: Marcello Pagliero, Aldo Fabrizi, Anna Magnani, Harry Feist. Režie: Roberto Rossellini.
p.d: Rome, 1944. Giorgio Manfredi, one of the leaders of the Resistance, is tracked down by the Nazis. He goes to his friend Francesco's, and asks Pina, Francesco's fiancée, for help. Pina must warn a priest, Don Pietro Pellegrini, that Giorgio needs to leave the town as soon as possible ...
